fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: *At day you may start to train a member of the town/neutral without factional chat, they will be informed of this. After 3 days, they will become a Guild Apprentice (Guild Evil) with their past abilities. Guild Apprentices passively give 1 Profit every day and cost 3 Profit at the moment they die. If you go into the negatives due a Guild Apprentice dying, you will die aswell, as you will be arrested.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
*You may only have 1 Apprentice at one time.
*Guild Apprentices win with you
*Once the Guild Master dies due negative profit, immeadily gain 5 Profit and cancel the effect of negative profit

fields.name: Item:
fields.value:
Guild Application
Cost 10
Uses 1
Hire: Immeadily convert a chosen member of the town/neutral without factional chat into a Guild Apprentice

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all good players (to appease shareholders)
